snippet: The choreographer and dancer Priyadarsini Govind closed the Erasing Borders festival with a spirited performance at Asia Society.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews solo dance performance by Priyadarsini Govind at Asia Society, the culmination of the Erasing Borders festival of Indian dance.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer and dancer Priyadarsini Govind closed the Erasing Borders festival with a spirited performance at Asia Society.

headline.main: Perfecting the Art of Expression in Movements Subtle and Bold
headline.print_headline: Perfecting the Art of Expression In Movements Subtle and Bold
